text: yahaan tak ki jab hamaara aadesh aa gaya aur tandoor ubal pada to hamane kaha, "har jaati mein se do-do ke jode chadha lo aur apane gharavaalon ko bhee - sivaay aise vyakti ke jisake baare mein baat tay pa chukee hai - aur jo eemaan laaya ho use bhee." kintu usake saath jo eemaan lae the ve thode hee the
